authors.name: Michael   Morgan
authors.affiliation: Cancer Research UK - Cambridge Institute; University of Cambridge

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"87ehi","text":"Isolation of PBMCs from fresh whole human blood in Lithium Heparin blood tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cs3je","text":"-SepMate Tubes – StemCell (1 per 17 mL blood)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29ob0","text":"-Divalent cation-free PBS (no calcium or magnesium) + 2% FBS, filtered","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ivgt","text":"-Ficoll-Paque Plus (15 mL per 17 mL blood)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d714e","text":"-Eppendorf tubes for serum","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jvh0","text":"-Sterile pipet tips and sera pipets","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hmdk","text":"-50 mL falcons","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2j7o","text":"-Haemocytometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aui1u","text":"-FBS + 10% DMSO, filtered and chilled","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q24i","text":"-Cryovials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcha3","text":"-Mr Frosty","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5q3b5","text":"-       Start with everything at room temperature:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cia9f","text":"-       Add 15 mL Ficoll-Paque Plus to each SepMate tube by pipetting directly into centre of plastic separator (try not to introduce a lot of air beneath the separator)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vfb5","text":"-       Pool anti-coagulated blood tubes (3 x 9 mL Li Hep tubes) – should come to 27ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7b4a7","text":"-       Dilute 1:1 in PBS + 2% FBS (now have ~54 mL diluted blood)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ggtl","text":"-       Layer blood on top of Ficoll-Paque Plus by gently pipetting down the side of the SepMate tube (avoid pipetting directly above the small notches as this lets blood through to below the separator)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4kg9t","text":"-       Cap tightly and spin at 1200 x g, 10m, RT, accelerator and break on full ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qhrq","text":"-       Cool PBS + 2% FBS in refrigerator and set centrifuge to cool (4C, though 10C should be sufficient)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3eoq","text":"-       Pour interface off SepMate tube into new 50 mL falcon (2 SepMate tubes per falcon – if odd number of tubes, even out the volumes between falcons)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"frt8m","text":"-       Top cells up to 45 mL with chilled PBS + 2% FBS, mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c412m","text":"-       Centrifuge 900 x g, 10m in cooled centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e68jg","text":"-       Meanwhile, centrifuge 5 mL serum tube in the same spin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7akk4","text":"-       Discard supernatant and flick to dislodge pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7n86","text":"-       Resuspend cells in chilled PBS + 2% FBS and pool cells from each individual into 1 tube with 40 mL buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b1o12","text":"-       Centrifuge 300 x g, 10m in cooled centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sdo3","text":"-       Meanwhile, aliquot serum (avoid any red) and store aliquots in freezer (these do not contain any human cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a0hgq","text":"-       Discard supernatant and flick to dislodge pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35ia2","text":"-       Resuspend cells in 25 mL chilled PBS + 2% FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9sfrj","text":"-       Take 10 uL aliquot and count on haemocytometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ep3o0","text":"-       Centrifuge 300 x g, 10m in cooled centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"af15a","text":"-       Discard supernatant and pipet off final drips, flick to dislodge pellet  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9amsv","text":"-       Resuspend cells in chilled 1-1.5 mL FBS + 10% DMSO (if more than 15 million cells, make multiple aliquots) – Freeze in ~5million cell aliquots","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73ifh","text":"-       Rapidly move cryovials to Mr Frosty and put in -80C Freezer         ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: PBMC isolation
